title: Pixel XL crash with 'WhatsApp'!!!!
content: I updated my Pixel to Android10 but it's not working for me. Especially 'WhatsApp'!!!, installed last update from playstore. But when I do video calling, It freezes and don't respond, takes times to get back in the app. And when I would to share some content (images, videos) from other apps (fb, twitter, youtube) it takes too slow, Android9 was very fine. Please fix it ASAP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
